pageTitle: Parking & Campus Maps - WakeMed Raleigh Hospital Entrances - NC
textBeforeTable: Visitor Parking Rates Parking for visitors is available in P1 Parking Deck - 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.. Please Note: The Visitor Entrance is locked from 8 pm to 5 am. During these hours, visitors should park at the P3 (orange) Parking Deck and use the Patient Registration Entrance. Shuttle service is available from the Visitor Entrance and Patient Registration Entrance 24 hours a day. Please call 919-350-8170 or 919-350-8171 if you would like an escort to the parking decks. Complimentary valet parking is available at the Heart Center between the hour sof 6 am to 7 pm, Monday through Friday. A pedestrian bridge connects P1 Parking Deck to the Visitor Entrance in the Heart Tower & Children's Hospital, which is located in the First Floor Visitor Lobby.  A reception/information desk is located in the lobby.    Parking Rates for P5 & P3 Second Floor (pdf)  First Floor (pdf) Ground Floor (pdf) Heart Center Sixth Floor (pdf) Fifth Floor (pdf) Fourth Floor (pdf) Third Floor (pdf) Second Floor (pdf) First Floor (pdf) Main Building - Maps Main Building - First Floor
textAfterTable: Patient Parking All patients or their designated driver on day of service, day of admission or day of discharge will receive validation for parking. Parents of pediatric patients (age 18 or younger) are eligible for validation during the entire length of stay. Download a campus map with suggested parking areas based on your needs.     © WakeMed Health & Hospitals, Raleigh, NC  |  919.350.8000
